pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, June 15, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Brussels, Belgium

Private meetings.

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint press conference with the President of the European Council, Charles Michel, and the President of the European Commission, Ursula von der Leyen.

Briefing Room 00A, Ground Floor
Council of the European Union
Justus Lipsius Building

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will tour the facility at Pfizer Manufacturing Belgium.

Pfizer Manufacturing Belgium
Puurs

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:25 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Belgium, Alexander de Croo.

Meeting Room B055, Ground Floor
Pfizer Manufacturing Belgium

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

2:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with His Majesty the King of the Belgians.

Appartement Fontainebleau, First Floor
Royal Palace of Brussels

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Ottawa.

Melsbroek Military Airbase

Closed to media.
